Name: 57 T-Bird Shot
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Shot glass .
History: A 57 T-bird, or 1957 Ford Thunderbird to give it its full title, immortalised in the Beach Boys' song 'Fun Fun Fun', was the classic car for any 1950s' teenager. Top down, radio up, girl next to you...
Nutrition: One serving of 57 T-Bird Shot contains 127 calories
